verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1352><s%> you are without <S%G379><s%> excuse, <S%G379><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> [of you] who passes <S%G2919><s%> judgment, <S%G2919><s%> for in that you judge <S%G2919><s%> another, <S%G2087><s%> you condemn <S%G2632><s%> yourself; <S%G4572><s%> for you who judge <S%G2919><s%> practice <S%G4238><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> things. <S%G846><s%>

And we know <S%G3609><s%> that the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> rightly <S%G2596><s%> <S%G225><s%> falls <S%G1510><s%> upon those <S%G3588><s%> who practice <S%G4238><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> things. <S%G5108><s%>

And do you suppose <S%G3049><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> O <S%G5599><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> when you pass <S%G2919><s%> judgment <S%G2919><s%> upon those <S%G3588><s%> who practice <S%G4238><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> things <S%G5108><s%> and do <S%G4160><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> [yourself,] that you will escape <S%G1628><s%> the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?

Or <S%G2228><s%> do you think <S%G2706><s%> lightly <S%G2706><s%> of the riches <S%G4149><s%> of His kindness <S%G5544><s%> and forbearance <S%G463><s%> and patience, <S%G3115><s%> not knowing <S%G50><s%> that the kindness <S%G5543><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> leads <S%G71><s%> you to repentance <S%G3341><s%>?

But because <S%G2596><s%> of your stubbornness <S%G4643><s%> and unrepentant <S%G279><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> you are storing <S%G2343><s%> up wrath <S%G3709><s%> for yourself <S%G4572><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of wrath <S%G3709><s%> and revelation <S%G602><s%> of the righteous <S%G1341><s%> judgment <S%G1341><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>
who <S%G3739><s%> will render <S%G591><s%> to every <S%G1538><s%> man <S%G1538><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his deeds: <S%G2041><s%>

to those <S%G3588><s%> who by perseverance <S%G5281><s%> in doing <S%G2041><s%> good <S%G18><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> for glory <S%G1391><s%> and honor <S%G5092><s%> and immortality, <S%G861><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life; <S%G2222><s%>

but to those <S%G3588><s%> who are selfishly <S%G2052><s%> ambitious <S%G2052><s%> and do not obey <S%G544><s%> the truth, <S%G225><s%> but obey <S%G3982><s%> unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> and indignation. <S%G2372><s%>

[There will be] tribulation <S%G2347><s%> and distress <S%G4730><s%> for every <S%G3956><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> who does <S%G2716><s%> evil, <S%G2556><s%> of the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> and also <S%G5037><s%> of the Greek, <S%G1672><s%>

but glory <S%G1391><s%> and honor <S%G5092><s%> and peace <S%G1515><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G3956><s%> who does <S%G2038><s%> good, <S%G18><s%> to the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> and also <S%G5037><s%> to the Greek. <S%G1672><s%>
For there is no <S%G3756><s%> partiality <S%G4382><s%> with God. <S%G2316><s%>

For all <S%G3745><s%> who <S%G3745><s%> have sinned <S%G264><s%> without <S%G460><s%> the Law <S%G460><s%> will also <S%G2532><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> without <S%G460><s%> the Law; <S%G460><s%> and all <S%G3745><s%> who <S%G3745><s%> have sinned <S%G264><s%> under <S%G1722><s%> the Law <S%G3551><s%> will be judged <S%G2919><s%> by the Law; <S%G3551><s%>

for not the hearers <S%G202><s%> of the Law <S%G3551><s%> are just <S%G1342><s%> before <S%G3844><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> but the doers <S%G4163><s%> of the Law <S%G3551><s%> will be justified. <S%G1344><s%>

For when <S%G3752><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> who do not have <S%G2192><s%> the Law <S%G3551><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> instinctively <S%G5449><s%> the things of the Law, <S%G3551><s%> these, <S%G3778><s%> not having <S%G2192><s%> the Law, <S%G3551><s%> are a law <S%G3551><s%> to themselves, <S%G1438><s%>

in that they show <S%G1731><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> of the Law <S%G3551><s%> written <S%G1123><s%> in their hearts, <S%G2588><s%> their conscience <S%G4893><s%> bearing <S%G4828><s%> witness, <S%G4828><s%> and their thoughts <S%G3053><s%> alternately <S%G3342><s%> accusing <S%G2723><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> else <S%G2532><s%> defending <S%G626><s%> them,

on the day <S%G2250><s%> when, <S%G3739><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to my gospel, <S%G2098><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will judge <S%G2919><s%> the secrets <S%G2927><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
But if <S%G1487><s%> you bear <S%G2028><s%> the name <S%G2028><s%> "Jew, <S%G2453><s%>" and rely <S%G1879><s%> upon the Law, <S%G3551><s%> and boast <S%G2744><s%> in God, <S%G2316><s%>
and know <S%G1097><s%> [His] will, <S%G2307><s%> and approve <S%G1381><s%> the things that are essential, <S%G1308><s%> being instructed <S%G2727><s%> out of the Law, <S%G3551><s%>
and are confident <S%G3982><s%> that you yourself <S%G4572><s%> are a guide <S%G3595><s%> to the blind, <S%G5185><s%> a light <S%G5457><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who are in darkness, <S%G4655><s%>

a corrector <S%G3810><s%> of the foolish, <S%G878><s%> a teacher <S%G1320><s%> of the immature, <S%G3516><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> in the Law <S%G3551><s%> the embodiment <S%G3446><s%> of knowledge <S%G1108><s%> and of the truth, <S%G225><s%>

you, therefore, <S%G3767><s%> who teach <S%G1321><s%> another, <S%G2087><s%> do you not teach <S%G1321><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%>? You who preach <S%G2784><s%> that one should not steal, <S%G2813><s%> do you steal <S%G2813><s%>?

You who say <S%G3004><s%> that one should not commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery, <S%G3431><s%> do you commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery <S%G3431><s%>? You who abhor <S%G948><s%> idols, <S%G1497><s%> do you rob <S%G2416><s%> temples <S%G2416><s%>?
You who <S%G3739><s%> boast <S%G2744><s%> in the Law, <S%G3551><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> your breaking <S%G3847><s%> the Law, <S%G3551><s%> do you dishonor <S%G818><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>?

For "the name <S%G3686><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is blasphemed <S%G987><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of you," just <S%G2531><s%> as it is written. <S%G1125><s%>

For indeed <S%G3303><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> is of value, <S%G5623><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you practice <S%G4238><s%> the Law; <S%G3551><s%> but if <S%G1437><s%> you are a transgressor <S%G3848><s%> of the Law, <S%G3551><s%> your circumcision <S%G4061><s%> has become <S%G1096><s%> uncircumcision. <S%G203><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the uncircumcised <S%G203><s%> man <S%G203><s%> keeps <S%G5442><s%> the requirements <S%G1345><s%> of the Law, <S%G3551><s%> will not his uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> be regarded <S%G3049><s%> as circumcision <S%G4061><s%>?

And will not he who is physically <S%G5449><s%> uncircumcised, <S%G203><s%> if he keeps <S%G5055><s%> the Law, <S%G3551><s%> will he not judge <S%G2919><s%> you who <S%G3588><s%> though <S%G1223><s%> having the letter <S%G1121><s%> [of the Law <S%G3551><s%>] and circumcision <S%G4061><s%> are a transgressor <S%G3848><s%> of the Law?

For he is not a Jew <S%G2453><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is one outwardly <S%G1722><s%>; <S%G5318><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> is circumcision <S%G4061><s%> that which is outward <S%G5318><s%> in the flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

But he is a Jew <S%G2453><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is one inwardly; <S%G2927><s%> and circumcision <S%G4061><s%> is that which is of the heart, <S%G2588><s%> by the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> not by the letter; <S%G1121><s%> and his praise <S%G1868><s%> is not from men, <S%G444><s%> but from God. <S%G2316><s%>
